org.docheinstein.commons.utils.http

Class HttpRequester

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.docheinstein.commons.utils.http.HttpRequester

  • public class HttpRequester
extends java.lang.Object
    Entity able to perform HTTP request using different HttpRequester.RequestMethod and eventually basic authentication.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  HttpRequester.ContentType
      'Content-Type' header types.
      static class  HttpRequester.RequestMethod
      HTTP request method.
      static class  HttpRequester.Response
      The response obtained from a requester request.
